# portkey_users (Data Source)

Fetches all Portkey users in the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `users` (Attributes List) List of users. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))

<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `users`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was created.
- `email` (String) Email address of the user.
- `id` (String) User identifier.
- `role` (String) Organization role of the user.
- `status` (String) Status of the user account.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was last updated.
